name: teleportArrival2
text: Nancy: When you're ready, go meet your grandmother in the kitchen!

name: teleportNight1
text: I guess it won't be a problem if I explore the house at night.

name: teleportKitchenFakeFadeOut
text: Edgar: That was delicious!#lbGrandma: I am glad you enjoyed, sweetie!

name: teleportDay2
text: I wonder if I should ask grandma and Nancy about what I heard last night.

name: teleportNight2
text: Now that everyone's sleeping, I can explore the house a little bit.

name: teleportDay3
text: What were those things in the house last night?#pbI better ask grandma or Nancy about it...
